home2.title: LET ME <highlight>INTRODUCE</highlight> MYSELF
home2.introduction: I am NGUYEN Le Diem Quynh from Vietnam. I’m currently in my 4th year of engineering at INSA Centre Val de Loire, France.
home2.description: I’d describe myself as motivated, curious, and meticulous - I love diving into new challenges and learning along the way!
home2.passion: I fell in love with the world of web and software development and have gained a strong foundation in full-stack development.
home2.skills: My expertise includes <text>Python (Django, Django Rest Framework, ...), SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL), and JavaScript (ReactJS)</text>.
home2.interests: My interests lie in optimizing data flow and enhancing interactivity, while also exploring advanced algorithms to strengthen backend development.
home2.goals: I’m passionate about API development, database management, and real-time network systems, as well as mastering every layer of the software stack to build seamless, high-performance applications.
home2.ambition: Building on the knowledge and skills I’ve gained, I am eager to find an opportunity where I can apply what I’ve learned, continue developing my expertise, and contribute value in an environment that fosters innovation and effective communication.

projects.title: My Recent Works
projects.subtitle: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

projectCards.title: Movie Night
projectCards.subtitle: Personal Project
projectCards.description: A full-stack web application designed as a social platform to simplify organizing movie events.

projectCards.title: Vaukazimut
projectCards.subtitle: University Project
projectCards.description: A mobile application designed to support the management and organization of orienteering sports at INSA University.

projectCards.title: Evolution Game
projectCards.subtitle: University Project
projectCards.description: A simulation of a multiplayer evolution game involves combining elements of strategy, simulation, and real-time or turn-based interaction among players.

tasks.label: Database Construction
action: Design and build the database schema using PostgreSQL.
Create tables, relationships, and indexes for optimized data access.
Ensure data integrity and normalization to maintain efficiency and reliability.

tasks.label: Division into Apps
action: Organize the project into modular apps for better code management.
Apps include:
subActions: Movie: Handling movie data and interactions.

tasks.label: Authentication
subActions: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for token-based authentication.
Google OAuth2 for third-party login options.

tasks.label: Movie Management
action: Integrate the OMDB API to fetch and display movie data.
Allow users to search for and view movie details.
Use Celery tasks for background processing and data updates.
Organize events related to movies (movienight, invitation).

tasks.label: Profile
action: Enable users to customize and manage their profiles.
Support updating personal information and avatar.

tasks.label: Notifications
action: Implement a notification system using Celery for asynchronous tasks.
Send scheduled alerts to keep users informed.

tasks.label: Chat
action: Develop a real-time chat feature using WebSockets.
Integrate Ably for seamless real-time messaging.
Use webhooks for event handling and Firebase for file storage and archiving.

tasks.label: Testing
action: Ensure code quality with comprehensive testing using Pytest.
Cover unit and integration tests for models, APIs, and integrations.
Identify and fix potential issues early to maintain stability.

tasks.label: CI/CD
action: Set up continuous integration (CI) with GitHub Actions that runs tests.
Use Docker for containerization to streamline development and deployment.

tasks.label: Other Features
subActions: CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) for secure API access.
Request throttling to manage traffic and prevent overuse.
TypeScript for better code maintainability and type safety.
